sentence: The reason for the order switch was external forces. Without them the order doesn't make much of a difference but in the presence of non-smooth forces, semi-Lagrangian advection without prior diffusion can cause artifacts. A different advection scheme might not have this problem. If the reversed order suits your case better, feel free to create a custom Physics class or simply call `diffuse` and `advect` in the order you like.
